lead_paragraph: Four Russian gold-medal winners at the Sochi Olympics used performance-enhancing drugs, the whistleblowers who exposed systemic cheating in that country's track program tell "60 Minutes" in an interview to air Sunday.

headline.print_headline: '60 Minutes' Report: Russian Gold Medalists Took Steroids
headline.main: '60 Minutes' Report: Russian Gold Medalists Took Steroids

snippet: Four Russian gold-medal winners at the Sochi Olympics used performance-enhancing drugs, the whistleblowers who exposed systemic cheating in that country's track program tell "60 Minutes" in an interview to air Sunday....
